title: Computational study of the dimerization of glyphosate: mechanism and effect of solvent
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23184-23203
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04300F, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sondes Meddeb-Limem, Arij Ben Fredj
The dimerization process of Glyph appears to be exergonic in the gas phase and in solution. The mechanism of dimerization, in water, could be described by a set of equilibria including proton transfer paths between zwitterionic dimer tautomers.
